title: Trump â€˜beheadsâ€™ Lady Liberty in controversial Der Spiegel magazine cover
text:
Trump â€˜beheadsâ€™ Lady Liberty in controversial Der Spiegel magazine cover Published time: 3 Feb, 2017 22:47 Get short URL Â© Der Spiegel The latest cover of one of Europeâ€™s largest weekly magazines, Der Spiegel, has been widely discussed on social media, as the publication decided to feature Americaâ€™s new leader in a provocative pose. Das neue Heft ist da! https://t.co/sVpC6v6nlW pic.twitter.com/2AJsebvR1V â€” DER SPIEGEL (@DerSPIEGEL) February 3, 2017 
On the cover, the quite recognizable figure of Donald Trump is seen holding a bleeding head of the Statue of Liberty in one hand and a bloodstained knife in the other. Der Spiegelâ€™s online version even offers an animated version, with the blood dripping from Lady Libertyâ€™s severed head. It's very difficult to analyse Germany's opinion on Trump's first two weeks as POTUS. Let's try and interpret Der Spiegel magazine's cover ğŸ¤” pic.twitter.com/jMbA1ATmoy â€” Thomas Markstahler (@TMarkstahler) February 3, 2017 
The cover is an apparent reference to Trumpâ€™s recent executive order that introduced a temporary travel ban on nationals from certain Arab countries. Dubbed the â€œMuslim ban,â€ the order has spurred a wave of protests and lawsuits.
